answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Nocturia is a symptom of diabetes mellitus. But bed-wetting that starts in adulthood (secondary enuresis) is uncommon and requires medical evaluation. It could be due to urinary tract infections, diabetes mellitus, neurological disorders and urinary tract stones. Please discuss this with your doctor am sure he will provide further assistance.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: Hi everyoneI always pee twice or three times (very little) before sleep, and always pee once during my sleep at around 6:00 am.Is that nomoral?
title: pee twice before sleep
